title: Resolve Stakeholder Disagreement
description: The architect and the structural engineer disagree on a design detail. The PM must facilitate a resolution.

tasks.description: Log the design conflict in the project issue tracker.
tasks.expected_outcome: The disagreement is formally documented as an issue.

tasks.description: Schedule a meeting with the architect and the structural engineer to discuss the conflict.
tasks.expected_outcome: A meeting is scheduled to resolve the issue.

tasks.description: Document the agreed-upon resolution from the meeting and distribute it to the project team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The resolution is documented and communicated to prevent confusion.
